attributes.action: Prevent halal slaughtering in the UK
attributes.additional_details: To heavily govern to slaughtering of animals for human consumption. Cruelty is not acceptable
attributes.background: Prevent the slaughter of animals for human consumption, using the practices of slitting an animals throat, to adhere to religious beliefs

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban non-stun slaughter in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700557
